snippet.title: Tastrion - Trailer 2
snippet.description:
An updated trailer showcasing some new stuff that will be in the game soon.
The major update will consist of a Hard mode for those who seek more challenge. There will be two new secret stages and an all-power secret super weapon ready to be claimed, all of which will be accessed through Hard Mode.
There will also be a Stage select for practice purposes.

Lastly, there have been a lot of minor quality-of-life changes.
